name: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing
descr:
Garfield, the famous lasagna-loving cat is back to take on Jon, Odie and company in a no-holds-barred racing game!

Choose your character and kart according to their characteristics and your driving style, get off the starting line first and control skids to outrun your opponents. Use crazy bonus objects, like the Pillow or the Magic Wand, to gain an edge and get over the finishing line first. Are you lazy like Garfield? Take shortcuts to overtake the other racers with the Spring!

Race your friends in local mode or online, with up to eight players on 16 iconic circuits from the world of Garfield.

[list][li]3 GAME MODES: Grand Prix, Single Race, Time Trial
[/li][li]MULTIPLAYER up to 4 players in split-screen mode and up to 8 players in online mode
[/li][li]16 CIRCUITS: Crazy races in stunning environments inspired by the world of Garfield, such as Palerock Lake and Pastacosi Factory
[/li][li]8 CHARACTERS: Garfield, Odie, Jon, Nermal, Arlene, Liz, Harry and Squeak
[/li][li]9 ATTACK AND DEFENSE BONUSES to turn the race around
[/li][li]CUSTOMIZE your character and kart with dozens of accessories[/li][/list]
detail:

review: 最近评测: 特别好评 (86) - 过去 30 天内的 86 篇用户评测中有 84% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (9,957) - 此游戏的 9,957 篇用户评测中有 89% 为好评。
